title: Casio's latest G-Shock Mudman is one tough, solar-powered adventure watch
description: Can your smartwatch do all this? The Casio G-Shock Mudman GW-9500 -- sporting three sensors, a dual-layer LCD, and sustainable materials -- delivers all the data you need, plus unlimited battery life.

title: iPhone 15 eSIM: How to transfer your phone number to Apple's new iPhone

title: This charging cable with a twist works on every device, even your new iPhone 15

title: I tested KDE Plasma 6 and found it very familiar. Here's why that's a good thing
description: Trying out an early release version of the KDE Plasma desktop, I was surprised to see such a subtle upgrade of the open-source desktop. But yes, the development team is taking just the right approach.
